articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Retirement home residents displaced, storm cleanup begins in parts of southwestern Ontario | CBC News
articles.description: For the second straight week, a vicious thunderstorm has caused widespread damage across areas of southwestern Ontario. The focus of the weather's fury this time was on southern Essex County.
articles.content:
Thousands of people are still without electricity this morning, in an area stretching from Harrow, Ont., in Essex County, to Highgate, Ont., on the east side of Chatham-Kent.
For the second straight… [+3789 chars]

articles.author: Kyla Mandel
articles.title: It's 'Extremely Likely' This July Will Be the Hottest Month Ever
articles.description: “The extreme weather which has affected many millions of people in July is unfortunately the harsh reality of climate change."
articles.content: July isn't even over yet and a group of scientists are saying its extremely likely, it will be the hottest month ever recorded. That's according to the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) and the… [+2257 chars]

articles.title: Ashes 2023 live: England v Australia fifth Test score and weather at the Oval
articles.description: Australia may have retained the Ashes urn but England can still draw the series and deny their rivals a historic first series win on English soil since 2001
articles.content:
England are bidding to level the series and deny Australia their first Ashes victory overseas for more than 20 years, as the fifth and final Test begins at The Oval today.
